synopsis.text: Mao Otoha, a first-year student at Seirei High School, finds herself in an extraordinary situation when she steps into the virtual world of Aikatsu Planet. After a chance encounter with Meisa Hinata, Mao becomes the new avatar for the top idol Hana, following Hinata's sudden disappearance. As she embarks on her journey as an idol, Mao must keep her new identity a secret from everyone around her. Alongside her friends Shiori Motoya, Ruli Tamaki, and Kyōko Umekōji, Mao navigates the thrilling world of Battle Stages, utilizing Swing Cards and Dressia to don captivating outfits. With her sights set on becoming the ultimate idol, Mao strives to balance her ordinary life with her secret role as Hana, embracing the motto: 'To become the 'me' I want to be, I enter the mirror.'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
